text: Jiseuot teuma kaphe seurakah Awak nyang kaphe lam kawan gopnyan Jikheun peue rohnyan keunoe tapeugah Gata kon insan cit lagee kamoe Bek tapeureunoe kamoe ka ceudah Kamoe eu ureueng nyang ikot gata Rakyat jeulata nyang khek that leupah Awak nyang bangai lam kawan kamoe Nyan rijang jinoe pateh peurintah Gata tan leubeh roh nibak kamoe Keupeue atranyoe dum tajak peugah Bak karoe kira gata sulet that
